meta.title: Salon Privé Case Study | Construction Portfolio
meta.description: Detailed construction case study of Salon Privé at Living Luxe Design Show 2024.
meta.ogDescription: Framing strategy, curved feature execution, and finish coordination for a premium event booth.

hero.title: Salon Privé - Construction Breakdown
hero.summary: This case study documents how the booth was framed and prepared for premium finishes under tight event deadlines.

summary.title: Project Summary
summary.body: Salon Privé combined hospitality-style design with practical event construction. The build required accurate layout, efficient sequencing, and close collaboration with finishing trades.

scope.title: Scope of Work
items: Framing layout and assembly for walls and overhead elements.
Base platform support and substrate preparation.
Curved front feature framing with segmented tracks.
Coordination with finishing and millwork teams.
